languages.text: "Абеляр Версериан," {n}— старуха устремляет взор поверх вашего плеча, —{/n} "Сенешаль и правая рука ныне покойной Теодоры фон Валанциус. И ее ныне здравствующе{mf|го|й} наследни{mf|ка|цы}".

traits.locale_text: "Абеляр Версериан," {n}- старуха устремляет взор поверх вашего плеча, -{/n} "Сенешаль и правая рука ныне покойной Теодоры фон Валанциус. И ее ныне здравствующе{mf|го|й} наследни{mf|ка|цы}".
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Abelard Werserian," {n}The old woman directs her gaze over your shoulder.{/n} "Seneschal and right hand of the now departed Theodora von Valancius. And of her now extant heir."

traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: “阿贝拉德·韦尔森。”{n}老妇人的视线越过了你的肩膀。{/n}“离世的西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的重臣，担任总领一职，也同样是现任继承人的总领。”
languages.original_text: "Abelard Werserian," {n}The old woman directs her gaze over your shoulder.{/n} "Seneschal and right hand of the now departed Theodora von Valancius. And of her now extant heir."

traits.locale_text: “阿贝拉德·韦尔森。”{n}老妇人的视线越过了你的肩膀。{/n}“离世的西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的重臣，担任总领一职，也同样是现任继承人的总领。”
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: «Abelard Werserian». {n}La anciana mira por encima de tu hombro.{/n} «Senescal y mano derecha de la difunta Theodora von Valancius. Y de su recién aparecid{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "Abelard Werserian," {n}The old woman directs her gaze over your shoulder.{/n} "Seneschal and right hand of the now departed Theodora von Valancius. And of her now extant heir."

traits.locale_text: «Abelard Werserian». {n}La anciana mira por encima de tu hombro.{/n} «Senescal y mano derecha de la difunta Theodora von Valancius. Y de su recién aparecid{mf|o|a} hereder{mf|o|a}».
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: 「アベラルド・ウェルザリアン」{n}老婦人はあなたの肩越しに凝視する。{/n}「今は亡きシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様の家令長にして右腕。現在、彼女の後継者においても同等の地位に就いていますね」
languages.original_text: "Abelard Werserian," {n}The old woman directs her gaze over your shoulder.{/n} "Seneschal and right hand of the now departed Theodora von Valancius. And of her now extant heir."

traits.locale_text: 「アベラルド・ウェルザリアン」{n}老婦人はあなたの肩越しに凝視する。{/n}「今は亡きシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウス様の家令長にして右腕。現在、彼女の後継者においても同等の地位に就いていますね」
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: « Abélard Werserian, {n}lance la vieille femme en regardant par-dessus votre épaule.{/n} Sénéchal et bras droit de feue Théodora von Valancius et, désormais, de {mf|héritier|héritière}. »
languages.original_text: "Abelard Werserian," {n}The old woman directs her gaze over your shoulder.{/n} "Seneschal and right hand of the now departed Theodora von Valancius. And of her now extant heir."

traits.locale_text: « Abélard Werserian, {n}lance la vieille femme en regardant par-dessus votre épaule.{/n} Sénéchal et bras droit de feue Théodora von Valancius et, désormais, de {mf|héritier|héritière}. »
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Abelard Werserian." {n}Die alte Frau blickt über deine Schulter hinweg.{/n} "Truchsess und rechte Hand der verstorbenen Theodora von Valancius. Und nun {mf|ihres Erben|ihrer Erbin}."
languages.original_text: "Abelard Werserian," {n}The old woman directs her gaze over your shoulder.{/n} "Seneschal and right hand of the now departed Theodora von Valancius. And of her now extant heir."

traits.locale_text: "Abelard Werserian." {n}Die alte Frau blickt über deine Schulter hinweg.{/n} "Truchsess und rechte Hand der verstorbenen Theodora von Valancius. Und nun {mf|ihres Erben|ihrer Erbin}."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Abelard Werserian." {n}Yaşlı kadın, bakışlarını omzunun üzerinden arkana dikiyor.{/n} "Merhum Theodora von Valancius'un Seneşal'i ve sağ koluydunuz. Şimdi de aramızda olan vârisi için aynı rolü üstlenmişsiniz."
languages.original_text: "Abelard Werserian," {n}The old woman directs her gaze over your shoulder.{/n} "Seneschal and right hand of the now departed Theodora von Valancius. And of her now extant heir."

traits.locale_text: "Abelard Werserian." {n}Yaşlı kadın, bakışlarını omzunun üzerinden arkana dikiyor.{/n} "Merhum Theodora von Valancius'un Seneşal'i ve sağ koluydunuz. Şimdi de aramızda olan vârisi için aynı rolü üstlenmişsiniz."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals
